intro_only_event_multi_winter_2025_login:
You’ve been good this year, so here’s a
present from your bud Arven!
Consider it a token of our friendship!

Oh, by the way! A winter party’s happening
on Pasio right now!

If you haven’t seen it yet, you should check
it out!

Let’s meet up with our pals and grab some
food—and eat to our hearts’ content!
